Blog.post: urlLink The picture took in afternoon ,when I rode my moto went to the Eslite book store , I waited traffic lights about one min time , I sew a telephone booth to reflect sky ,maybe you know that Taiwan just a small island ,especilly liveing in Taipei always feeling narrow ,Between buliding and building are too nearst ,so I'd like to face upward ,A men got the a telephone transmitter was calling to someone ,there is a Taipei afternoon ,Hot and crowded ,the world look like some diffently,Colour was evaporating.....2003/July urlLink
urlLink then When I went on the top , I sew a girl to ran down the pathway ,there had a bicycly whom left by her friend ....and this was a wonderful time at twilight. urlLink
urlLink That were my friend to stroll on the pathway around North mountain of Taiwan .... urlLink

urlLink The color picture was taken from my office window ,When I sew this color that feel so spirited on my mind .....I thought throught over sky from the building ,Between the city and a natural landscape urlLink

urlLink There are a couple of childrenon the house roof. This isa mountain chain of North Taiwan, and I was with a friend of minethere. He is a teacher at the this mountain school where has a lot of Taiwan aborigines. You look at these picture children. They are aborigines , very cute , and look diffrent from city children , I like them so I trid to took them on my film..... urlLink
urlLink le le lei ca .....expensive more than any camera.....TOOK on my desk urlLink
urlLink Thereis a Taipei residential area of street in morning.. urlLink
urlLink A typical character of Taiwan young man ,also He is a very professional freelance photographer ...... urlLink
urlLink This is a beautiful morning !! urlLink
urlLink There have me and a couple of photo friend.... urlLink

urlLink On last weekend ,I did some job about my friend got married ,when I came to the hotel,Is saw a beutiful sky ,this afternoon ,blue and light throught from bread shop , I like this feel... urlLink
urlLink In this night ,i went to see my DR,when I got on BUS ,The child is in fornt of me ,even I want to let seat ,my foot was hurt ...soso onThis but my mind is very strange.... urlLink
urlLink a hand of picture urlLink

urlLink The sketch was drawn by me ,when I was 21 years old ,I worked for NAVY ,those times had stoped to think all about young life , I always thought if some day war being ,how could I doing for ,The sunset at xin-zhu ,I don't quite sure where the seaboard exactly , but I always remember that red sky and big sun from the extremity of sea ,........ urlLink
urlLink This early morning was in 1994, and I thought landscap should be naturally to resemble the time....... urlLink
urlLink He is a colleague of NAVY ,We were always work together... urlLink

urlLink There was a landscape of I-LAN ,When paddy rice was fallow ,I always staied to see the beauty view in front dong-shan river ,The farmland reflect cloud ,A motocycle to mount around.....I love I-lan ///1996 urlLink
urlLink When I was a young man.........always went around Taiwan.........miss of LIFE urlLink
